title: reconnect
body: after champ select i cannot get into the game. It just says to reconnect. reinstalled league, and tried the suggestions on the earlier post. I tried the command prompt but it just replies with an error. I have the latest malwarebytes, my computer is updated. Pls help.

replies.body: pls i cant open the cher when i loog he say go to support help pls

It is probably related to content discussed in [this](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/sB4ucqXc-game-client-anti-cheat-changes-going-live) thread.  I recommend reading through that and commenting there if problems continue.
